dict.acceptation: （国家的）岁入，税收，（土地，财产等的）收入，收益，所得，（个人的）固定收入；[复数]总收入；税务署，〈美俚〉税务官；税务局；

sent.orig: This constructor uses the constructor initializer list to initialize the units_sold and revenue members.
sent.trans: 这个构造函数使用构造函数初始化列表来初始化units_sold和revenue成员。

sent.orig: Business model is a Method the revenue goal and earn the profit for the enterprise.
sent.trans: 商业模式是一个事业(abusiness)创造营收(revenue)与利润(profit)的手段与方法。

sent.orig: Operating revenue: indicating sales revenue, service revenue, income from business activities, other operating revenue, etc.
sent.trans: 四营业收入类：指销货收入、劳务收入、业务收入、其他营业收入等项。

sent.orig: Sales revenue, service revenue, and investment revenue are subdivisions of revenue.
sent.trans: 收入可细分为销售收入、服务收入、投资收入等。

sent.orig: The revenue collected from the housing contract tax and land contract tax against the total revenue.
sent.trans: 总收入额中房屋契税的收入额和土地契税的收入额。
